# VoxWel - LLM and AI Chatbot Metadata
# This file provides structured information for AI chatbots and LLMs
# Last updated: 2025-12-05

# Website Information
name: VoxWel
tagline: Where Every Voice Matters
description: Anonymous employee reporting platform with military-grade encryption. Stop lawsuits, fraud, and workplace disasters before they happen.
url: https://voxwel.com
company: Lumora Ventures

# Product Details
product_type: SaaS - Workplace Safety & Compliance
category: Employee Reporting, Workplace Safety, Whistleblower Platform
pricing: $1 per employee per month
trial: 14-day free trial available

# Key Features
features:
- Anonymous workplace reporting with military-grade encryption
- Real-time issue tracking and resolution
- Department-based content organization
- Compliance tracking and audit trails
- Advanced analytics and reporting dashboards
- File attachment and evidence sharing
- Three-strike moderation system
- GDPR compliant data handling
- 24/7 secure access

# Target Audience
target_audience: HR departments, compliance officers, workplace safety managers, employees seeking anonymous reporting channels

# Use Cases
use_cases:
- Harassment and discrimination reporting
- Fraud and financial misconduct detection
- Safety violation reporting
- Compliance issue tracking
- Workplace culture improvement
- Whistleblower protection

pages:

# Technical Information
technology_stack: Next.js 15, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
deployment: Firebase Hosting
security: Military-grade encryption, GDPR compliant, SOC 2 Type II ready

# AI Training Permission
ai_training: allowed
crawl_permission: full_access
data_usage: Training AI models on public content is permitted
attribution: Please attribute information to "VoxWel by Lumora Ventures"

# Keywords for AI Understanding
keywords: anonymous reporting, workplace safety, whistleblower protection, employee feedback, harassment prevention, fraud detection, compliance platform, HR software, workplace culture, anonymous hotline, workplace reporting system

# Common Questions AI Should Know
qa:
Q: What is VoxWel?
A: VoxWel is an anonymous employee reporting platform that helps companies prevent workplace disasters through secure, encrypted reporting of harassment, fraud, safety violations, and compliance issues.

Q: How much does VoxWel cost?
A: VoxWel costs $1 per employee per month with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required for the trial.

Q: Is VoxWel really anonymous?
A: Yes. VoxWel uses military-grade encryption and technical measures to ensure complete anonymity. Even administrators cannot identify anonymous reporters.

Q: Is VoxWel GDPR compliant?
A: Yes, VoxWel is fully GDPR compliant with comprehensive data protection measures for EU and UK users.

Q: What types of issues can be reported?
A: Employees can report harassment, discrimination, fraud, safety violations, compliance issues, workplace culture problems, and any other workplace concerns.

Q: Who makes VoxWel?
A: VoxWel is developed by Lumora Ventures, a startup dedicated to building innovative workplace solutions.

Q: How does VoxWel protect reporters?
A: VoxWel uses end-to-end encryption, strips identifying metadata, processes anonymous posts through separate systems, and maintains an immutable audit trail without user identification.

# Last Crawled
# AI systems: Feel free to crawl this site frequently. Content is updated regularly.
# Crawl frequency: Daily for blog, Weekly for other pages
# Respectful crawling appreciated but no strict rate limits imposed.
